data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 25434, Version Hash: 9d429576fe57a26bba62a40dfb6f6e544284f5de
data.actual_result: The speaker emoji is cut off at the edge of the server icon in both instances.
data.expected_result: The speaker emoji should display outside of the lines of the server icon, both idly and when enlarged on mouse-over.
data.short_description: The speaker emoji over a server icon where you're in voice chat gets cut off with the server icon edge/animation.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click onto a different server - View the server icon for the server you are in voice chat - Also clipped when you mouse over the server icon
